title: Safaree Samuels and Erica Mena get married just ONE WEEK after their pregnancy announcement
text:
Love and Hip Hop stars Erica Mena and Safaree Samuels have now been pronounced husband and wife, just one week after announcing they're expecting.

Mena, 31, shared an Instagram video on Tuesday afternoon, showing off both hers and Samuels, 38, glimmering wedding bands.

The wedding ceremony happened Monday, according to Mena's Instagram caption that she posted on Tuesday.

Husband and wife: Love and Hip Hop stars Erica Mena and Safaree Samuels have now been pronounced husband and wife, just one week after announcing they're expecting

Matching rings: Mena, 31, shared an Instagram video on Tuesday afternoon, showing off both hers and Samuels, 38, glimmering wedding bands

'Married,' Mena began, along with a prayer hands emoji and a heart emoji, before thanking her Eden Diamonds for designing the rings.

'Thank you to my brother @edendiamonds for designing our wedding bands. 10-7-19 MR. & Mrs. Samuels,' she concluded.

Samuels also shared the same ring video on his Instagram, while sharing more details about the exquisite matching bands.

Married: 'Married,' Mena began, along with a prayer hands emoji and a heart emoji, before thanking her Eden Diamonds for designing the rings

Rings: Samuels also shared the same ring video on his Instagram, while sharing more details about the exquisite matching bands

'It cost to say "I Do" but its worth it,' Samuels began, before offering more details about the rings.

'A Matching Wedding Bands for All Natural VVS1/2 Full-Cut Invisible Set Baguette Diamonds Surrounded by Solitaire Brilliant Round Diamonds, and Micro-Pavè Sides,' he added.

'Thank you @edendiamons @nycluxury for bringing my vision to life!' Samuels concluded, adding the song in the video is No Regular Girl by Safaree ft Jahmiel.

Cost: 'It cost to say "I Do" but its worth it,' Samuels began, before offering more details about the rings

Exactly one week earlier, the couple revealed they were expecting their first child in a video posted by VH1, where their show Love & Hip Hop airs.

'Wow, it's a big deal! Very big deal. I didn't know I was capable of doing this, but I'm excited,' said Samuels, while rubbing Mena's baby bump.

'It's very surreal to me,' he added. 'I don't know what to do, but I know I'm going to be great at what I do, because I'm great at everything.'

Big deal: 'Wow, it's a big deal! Very big deal. I didn't know I was capable of doing this, but I'm excited,' said Samuels, while rubbing Mena's baby bump

Mena teased in an Instagram video on September 27 that it's 'almost time' for her to tie the knot, while showcasing her wedding dress designed by Ryan & Walter.

However, neither Mena nor Samuels revealed when the wedding date was on social media.

Mena is also a mother to a 12-year-old son named King Conde she had in 2007 with rapper Raul Conde, who she said will 'be a great big brother.'

Wedding: Mena teased in an Instagram video on September 27 that it's 'almost time' for her to tie the knot, while showcasing her wedding dress designed by Ryan & Walter
description: Love and Hip Hop stars Erica Mena and Safaree Samuels have now been pronounced husband and wife, just one week after announcing they're expecting.
